text: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead is a 1991 American black comedy movie directed by Stephen Herek and starring Christina Applegate, Joanna Cassidy, John Getz, Keith Coogan, Josh Charles, David Duchovny, Kimmy Robertson, Jayne Brook, Danielle Harris, Dulcie Gray. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and has gained a cult following. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Stephen Herek Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies about siblings Category:Cult movies
title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
